name: BlackFin Capital Partners
overview:
BlackFin is a private equity fund dedicated to financial services: distribution & brokerage, asset management, payments, online finance, capital markets.

An independent firm, BlackFin Capital Partners seeks equity investments, with limited leverage, where it takes minority or majority stakes, always with an influential position .

Its goal is to accompany companies in the next step of their development, investing between ten to thirty millions euro BlackFin Capital Partners targets companies across Continental Europe.

milestones.description: BlackFin Capital Partners finalises, at the end of 2009, a first closing in amount of €60 million, for its Financial Services Fund
milestones.source_description: First closing of BlackFin Financial Services Fund for an amount of €60 million

milestones.description: BlackFin Capital Partners raises € 220 million for its Financial Services Fund
milestones.source_description: Blackfin Capital Partners raises €220 million for its Financial Services Fund

funds.name: Financial Services Fund
funds.source_description: BlackFin Closes On $86M So Far For Financial Services Fund
